name: Abdul Rafay
headline: Software Engineer
summary: Full-stack Software Engineer with internship experience in web, mobile, and backend development. Proficient in .NET, Flutter, C++, Python, and MERN stack. Skilled in writing clean, maintainable code and following Agile and DevOps practices. Eager to grow in a dynamic, real-world environment.

work_experience.title: Intern
work_experience.description: Developed and deployed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and Dart, implemented responsive UI designs, integrated Firebase Authentication, Cloud Firestore, and Realtime Database, constructed RESTful API interfaces, utilized Git for version control, and implemented CI/CD pipelines.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (BSCS)

projects.title: LeafSpec: AI-Powered Plant Species Identification API
projects.description: Built a RESTful microservice that classifies plant species from leaf images, structured endpoints with Flask Blueprints, designed flexible MongoDB schemas, implemented robust image-preprocessing and inference pipeline, and containerized and deployed the service via Nixpacks and Gunicorn.

projects.title: SOW Parts App
projects.description: Developed a cross-platform system for automotive parts procurement, built a responsive web portal using Next.js, designed a React Native mobile app, implemented a robust backend using NestJS and MySQL, and built an admin panel for user approval and supplier/driver management.

projects.title: Homeschooling Resource Hub
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive platform to manage and distribute homeschooling resources, designed age-, class-, and region-based categorization, built a dual-interface system with an admin dashboard, and created a responsive public-facing landing page featuring advanced filtering.

projects.title: SBMTech Cybersecurity Consultancy Website
projects.description: Built a responsive, multi-page consultancy website with modern UI using Next.js, integrated real-time cybersecurity news feeds, implemented contact form with server-side MailerSend API, and developed reusable UI components and custom styling.
